title: Mac FPS starts every game at 100-150 and then drops gradually to 15-30.
body: When is this going to be fixed?

replies.body:
I saw your reply on the Known Bugs in macOS Sierra post. Since we've established that Sierra is prone to issues because it's so new, this may simply just be a growing pains issue related to the new OS. I'd like you to check out our [Mac FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#section-mac) for some common solutions for this issue.

If you continue to have FPS issues after taking those steps, then this is something we'll have to look into.

I contacted support and they basically told me to talk to Apple. 

Here's the thing. 

I know it's not my computer. I know it has nothing to do with my system. I have tried literally every single possible fix for this, and I have concluded that it is not something I can fix. Riot has to implement a fix. 

I have tried running the game at the lowest possible resolution and lowest possible graphics, turning almost everything off giving me the worst possible quality I can possibly have, and I still have the exact same FPS. I've tried every solution on the troubleshooting guide, I've tried underground fixes from Reddit and other sources including old league forum posts. 

I don't recall having bad FPS before patch 6.20. Additionally, my FPS is even worse after 6.21. This game is actually unplayable now. 

Great timing, considering it's almost the end of the season. I can't reach my ranked goals because I can't play anymore. Doom bots is also completely unplayable, way worse than a normal game. 

I also believe this has nothing at all to do with Sierra. I upgraded mid 6.20 expecting Sierra to fix my FPS. It didn't fix my FPS, in fact, it didn't do anything at all. 

If you guys aren't going to fix this issue for Macs then please let me know so I can stop waiting around for a fix and waste a thousand dollars on a new PC just to play league.

Since you're already working with a tech specialist, as I've just peeked at your ticket, I recommend continuing to work with them on this. They have system logs which gives them far more context regarding what's going on.

If you have any other questions or concerns, hit me up again.

You just peeked at my ticket, and didn't see that it was labeled as "resolved"? 

You should consider the option that league has evolved to the point where it no longer supports macs, and that you need to update the mac client to reflect on those issues.
